mapper.select:

distinct
from MST_CUST_TANKA
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into MST_CUST_TANKA (Cust_Code, Shop_Code, Item_Code, SALES_KB, Valid_To, Valid_From, Cust_Deli_Tanka, Cust_Sell_Tanka, Cust_Bild_Tanka, Bunrui_Code, STS_Code, INS_USERID, INS_PGID, INS_YMD, INS_TIME, UPD_USERID, UPD_PGID, UPD_YMD, UPD_TIME) values (#{custCode,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{shopCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{itemCode,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{salesKb,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{validTo,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{validFrom,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{custDeliTanka,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{custSellTanka,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{custBildTanka,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bunruiCode,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{stsCode,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{insUserid,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{insPgid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{insYmd,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{insTime,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{updUserid,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{updPgid,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{updYmd,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{updTime,jdbcType=NCHAR})
